name: Pinboard
description: Automatically add your Pinboard bookmarks to any theme.

api_token.label: API Token
api_token.info: This token can be found at https://pinboard.in/settings/password

validation.error_message: Please enter the api key for your account. It can be found at https://pinboard.in/settings/password

element.label: Element
element.info: Enter the selector of the element where you would like your bookmarks to appear. If left blank it will simply be appended to the html body. You can also enter more than one selector if necessary by comma delimiting them (e.g. #header,#footer).

numOfItems.label: # items to show
numOfItems.info: Enter the number of bookmarks that you would like to be shown. Leaving it blank will default to show all of your bookmarks.

filterBy.label: Filter by tag
filterBy.info: Enter up to 3 tags to filter your Pinboard results by.

showDate.label: Show date pinned
showDate.info: If checked this will add the date for each bookmark to the output. This option requires that the timeago plugin is enabled.
